main event: A civilian reported seeing a balloon-like object moving rapidly against the wind in Wadena, Minnesota on August 14, 1955.
interesting points: The object appeared flat on top and bottom and was whitish like shiny aluminum., It had a V shape from the middle of the front to the rear on the bottom side., The witness described a dark row around the side resembling pullman windows., The object was extremely bright and climbed rapidly out of sight., The duration of the observation was 40 minutes.
